tool_description: Check if the text is written by a human or generated by an AI.
name: HumanWrite
title: HumanWrite

api_list.name: HumanWrite API
api_list.description: The endpoint takes 'action' and 'text' in the POST request and returns a score of the human-like text in percent from 0 to 100.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://humanwrite.p.rapidapi.com/api/humanwrite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humanwrite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://humanwrite.p.rapidapi.com/api/humanwrite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humanwrite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
